response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1,200,000 to us. Considering its significance to you, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving of $250,000 compared to our standard pricing, making it an attractive proposition for someone like yourself who appreciates the true worth of this product. We believe this offer presents a unique chance for you to secure a valuable asset at an advantageous rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
